events.message: A car collision occurred on April 30th resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and windshield. I am submitting the claim today.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under an auto accident due to damages from a collision involving the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist with the car accident claim and will be the point of contact moving forward.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision and assure prompt assistance in processing your case.
Please provide photographs of the damaged car parts and a copy of the police report regarding the accident for further investigation.
All requested documents, including detailed photos and official accident report, have been submitted successfully for your review.
The investigation into the vehicle collision is now underway to verify the claim details and ascertain liability.
The investigation has been completed, confirming that the claim is valid and damage estimates are consistent with reported incident.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on repair estimates and coverage terms for your review and approval.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim.
The claim has been formally approved and the agreed settlement amount is ready to be processed for payment.
Payment for the approved insurance claim was issued today and should reflect in your account within 2 business days.
The car accident claim case is now officially closed following successful settlement and payment disbursement.
